Network, supported bands and technologies TechnologyGSM / CDMA / HSPA / EVDO / LTE 2G bandsGSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - G920V, G920P CDMA 800 / 1900 - G920V, G920P, G920R 3G bandsHSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 - G920V 4G bandsLTE band 2(1900), 3(1800), 4(1700/2100), 5(850), 7(2600), 13(700) - G920V SpeedHSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps, EV-DO Rev.A 3.1 Mbps GPRSYes EDGEYes Release date First presented2015, March StatusAvailable. Released 2015, April Size and Dimensions Measurements143.5 x 70.6 x 6.9 mm (5.65 x 2.78 x 0.27 in) Weight140 g (4.94 oz) DesignCorning Gorilla Glass 4 back panel SIMNano-SIM - Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified) Display (type and size) TypeSuper AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size5.1 inches Resolution1440 x 2560 pixels MultitouchYes ProtectionCorning Gorilla Glass 4 - TouchWiz UI System and processor information OSAndroid OS, v5.0.2 (Lollipop) actualized v5.1 (Lollipop) ChipsetExynos 7420 Octa Central processing unitQuad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57 Graphics processing unitMali-T760MP8 Memory bank Slot for memory cardNo Built-in 3 GB RAM 32/64/128 GB Camera Primary16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm, OIS, autofocus, LED flash Features1/2.6" sensor size, 1.12 Ä¾m pixel size, geo-tagging, quick tap focus, face detection, Auto HDR, panorama Video2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, 720p@120fps, HDR, dual-video rec. Secondary5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm, 1440p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR Sound Different alarm typesVibration; MP3, WAV ringtones Main speaker Yes 3.5mm jack Yes - 24-bit/192kHz audio Communication WLANWi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot Bluetoothv4.1, A2DP, LE, aptX GPSYes, with A-GPS, GLONASS NFCYes IrDAYes RadioNo USBmicroUSB v2.0, USB Host Features SensorsFingerprint recognition, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer, heart rate monitor, SpO2 MessagingSMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM BrowserHTML5 JavaNo - Wireless charging (PMA) - market dependent - ANT+ support - S -Voice dictation and cammands recognition - noise cancellation feature - MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player - MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+/FLAC player - Photo/video editor - Document editor Battery Built-in Li-Ion 2550 mAh battery Talk timeUp to 23 h (3G) Music playerUp to 57 h Other ColorsWhite Pearl, Black Sapphire, Gold Platinum

We do our best to make the model description as accurate and reliable as possible, unfortunately you may find a mistake in our Samsung Galaxy S6 (USA) specs. Please contact us if something is wrong.
